meanings.definition: people who engage in the sport of skydiving while riding a board attached to their feet.
meanings.sent1: The skysurfers gracefully glided through the sky with their boards.
meanings.sent2: I watched the skysurfers jump out of the plane and soar through the clouds.
meanings.sent3: The skysurfers looked like flying acrobats as they danced in the air.
meanings.sent4: The skysurfers painted the sky with their daring moves.
meanings.sent5: The skysurfers seemed to defy gravity as they rode the wind currents.

meanings.definition: a group of individuals who surf the sky using specialized equipment.
meanings.sent1: Our team of skysurfers trained hard to perfect their aerial skills.
meanings.sent2: The skysurfers gathered at the airfield, ready to take on the sky.
meanings.sent3: The skysurfers' gear made them look like futuristic sky explorers.
meanings.sent4: The skysurfers navigated the vast sky like seasoned sailors on the sea.
meanings.sent5: The skysurfers' equipment gleamed in the sunlight as they prepared for takeoff.

meanings.definition: individuals who participate in the extreme sport of skysurfing.
meanings.sent1: The skysurfers' adrenaline surged as they leaped into the unknown.
meanings.sent2: Skysurfers push the boundaries of what is possible in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The skysurfers' enthusiasm for their sport was infectious.
meanings.sent4: Skysurfers are like modern-day daredevils, conquering the heavens.
meanings.sent5: The skysurfers' passion for skysurfing was evident in every jump they made.
